languages.text: When a creature in the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда существо, находящееся в зоне способности Области танатофобии получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, оно должно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g}. При провале на него накладывается эффект Танатофобия на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers damage, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: Когда существо, находящееся в зоне способности Области танатофобии получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, оно должно пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g}. При провале на него накладывается эффект Танатофобия на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the Thanatophobia Zone suffers damage, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the Thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: 每当处于{g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}死亡恐惧{/g}区域的生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得{g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}“死亡恐惧”{/g}效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When a creature in the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当处于死亡恐惧区域的生物受到伤害时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得“死亡恐惧”效果，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

每当处于死亡恐惧区域的生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会获得“死亡恐惧”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: 死恐怖症地帯にいる生物が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けたとき、その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、死恐怖症の効果を得る
languages.original_text: When a creature in the thanatophobia zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the thanatophobia effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 死恐怖症地帯にいる生物がダメージを受けた時、その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、死恐怖症の効果を得る。

死恐怖症地帯にいる生物が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けたとき、その生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格した場合、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、死恐怖症の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を得る

languages.text: Cuando una criatura en la zona de {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}tanatofobia{/g} sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daños{/g}, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si falla, sufre el efecto de {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}tanatofobia{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando una criatura en la zona de tanatofobia sufre daños, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si falla, sufre el efecto de tanatofobia durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Erleidet eine Kreatur in der {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}Thanatophobie{/g}-Zone {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, muss sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, erhält sie 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang den {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}Thanatophobie{/g}-Effekt.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet eine Kreatur in der Thanatophobie-Zone Schaden, muss sie eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Bei Nichtbestehen erhält sie 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang den Thanatophobie-Effekt.

languages.text: Lorsqu'une créature située dans la zone de {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobie{/g} subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. Si elle échoue à ce test, elle est frappée par l'effet {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}Thanatophobie{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une créature située dans la zone de thanatophobie subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. Si elle échoue à ce test, elle est frappée par l'effet Thanatophobie pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}Tanatofobi{/g} bölgesindeki bir yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Testi geçemezse 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}tanatofobi{/g} etkisine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: When a creature in the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} zone suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If it fails, it gains the {g|f:482633ad900b420aa0433246e7716f82}thanatophobia{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
